channel.title: Cisco on Farog Basher
channel.description: Recent content in Cisco on Farog Basher

item.title: Network and System Administrator
item.description: Description Networking & Network Security: In-depth knowledge of networking fundamentals, including routing, switching, and protocols. Experienced with network security practices, firewalls, VPNs, IDS/IPS systems, and maintaining secure network environments. Cloud Platforms: Proficient in Amazon Web Services (AWS), including EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, IAM, and other core services for managing cloud infrastructure. Virtualization: Hands-on experience with VMware vSphere for creating, managing, and optimizing virtual environments Aruba Networks: Expertise in deploying and managing Aruba Systems for wireless networks, monitoring, and securing access.

item.title: Internship in ZD-LAB focusing on CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate)
item.description: Description Networking Basics Fundamentals of networking (LANs, WANs, VLANs, WLANs) OSI and TCP/IP models IP addressing and subnetting (IPv4 and IPv6) Ethernet concepts and technologies Network topologies and devices (routers, switches, firewalls) Cisco Device Basics Cisco IOS (Internetwork Operating System) basics Command-Line Interface (CLI) navigation Initial configuration of Cisco routers and switches Saving and backing up configurations Switching and VLANs Basics of switching and MAC addresses Configuring VLANs and trunking Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) for loop prevention Inter-VLAN routing Routing Concepts
